attributes.action: Pay People in work for over 35y higher benefits when becoming unemployed
attributes.additional_details: People’s years of employment and contributions to society should be taken into account in the benefits system. Anyone who has worked for over 35 years should be entitled to a higher rate of benefits if they become unemployed.
attributes.background: After being employed all their lives, some people find themselves unemployed through no fault of their own. It can be soul-destroying and insulting for people who have paid tax for over 35 years to be treated the same as someone who has never worked.
